first_para: Giacomo (Jack) Lopresti (23 August 1969) is a British Conservative Party politician, and a member of the Conservative Friends of Israel group. In the 2010 general election he was elected Member of Parliament (MP) for Filton and Bradley Stoke, a constituency newly created by changes made by the Boundary Commission for England.

full.extract: Giacomo (Jack) Lopresti (23 August 1969) is a British Conservative Party politician, and a member of the Conservative Friends of Israel group. In the 2010 general election he was elected Member of Parliament (MP) for Filton and Bradley Stoke, a constituency newly created by changes made by the Boundary Commission for England.
full.title: Jack Lopresti
